bibl.title: Musical Evenings in the Early Empire: New Evidence from a Greek Papyrus with Musical Notation.
bibl.note: P. Yale Inv. 4510 (= P. Ct. YBR Inv. 4510). Parts of (probably) two Greek melic poems with running vocal musical notation. Provenance unknown, early second century A.D. - [Introduction.] - 1. Transcriptions. - 2. Text. - 3. Music. - References.
JOHNSON William A., Musical Evenings in the Early Empire: New Evidence from a Greek Papyrus with Musical Notation.
